readme:
## **How it works**

Creates a Google Calendar meeting using a Trello card's due date. When the card is moved to the a specific list, it pulls email addresses from the card's description to invite attendees and then adds the meeting link back to the Trello card. See the video of the automation working here: [Trello (Free) + Google Calendar (with n8n)](https://youtu.be/hzn1dL6HPE8)

## **Who is this template for?**

Free Trello users who want to automatically schedule Google Calendar meetings without leaving Trello.

## Tools needed

  * A Google Calendar account
  * A Trello account (free plan)
  * N8N



## **Set up instructions**

You can find all the instructions in the workflow or you can watch the video instructions: [Instructions Page](https://cool-homegrown-029.notion.site/Trello-Free-Google-Calendar-1f2718e8c6ba80af9ed2e96dffcb4c43?pvs=4)
readme_html:
How it works

Creates a Google Calendar meeting using a Trello card's due date. When the card is moved to the a specific list, it pulls email addresses from the card's description to invite attendees and then adds the meeting link back to the Trello card. See the video of the automation working here: Trello (Free) + Google Calendar (with n8n)

Who is this template for?

Free Trello users who want to automatically schedule Google Calendar meetings without leaving Trello.

Tools needed

  • A Google Calendar account
  • A Trello account (free plan)
  • N8N

Set up instructions

You can find all the instructions in the workflow or you can watch the video instructions: Instructions Page
readme_zh:
## **运作原理**

该功能利用Trello卡片截止日期创建Google Calendar会议。当卡片被移至特定列表时，系统会从卡片描述中提取电子邮件地址邀请参会者，并将会议链接添加回Trello卡片。查看自动化操作视频演示：[Trello（免费版）+ Google Calendar（通过n8n实现）](https://youtu.be/hzn1dL6HPE8)

## **适用人群**

希望无需离开Trello即可自动安排Google Calendar会议的免费版Trello用户。

## **所需工具**

* Google Calendar账户  
* Trello账户（免费版）  
* N8N自动化平台  

## **配置指南**

完整设置说明可在工作流中查看，或观看视频教程：[操作指南页面](https://cool-homegrown-029.notion.site/Trello-Free-Google-Calendar-1f2718e8c6ba80af9ed2e96dffcb4c43?pvs=4)
